translation.en: [interviewer] Okay, we're recording.
translation.zh: 好 我们正在录音

translation.en: [Tyler Barriss] All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [interviewer] So, maybe the best place to start is,
translation.zh: 不如先说说

translation.en: how did you get involved in this?
translation.zh: 你是如何卷进这件事的吧

translation.en: [Barriss] I was in an argument with someone that  most people would consider a hacker.
translation.zh: 我跟一个人发生了口角大多数人都会认为他是个黑客

translation.en: I was reading the texts on my phone,
translation.zh: 我在看手机上的短信

translation.en: and I guess I said something that kind of, I have to assume,
translation.zh: 也许我说的一些话 冒犯了他的尊严或自尊

translation.en: like, insulted his pride or his ego or something.
translation.zh: 冒犯了他的尊严或自尊

translation.en: And this person sent the SWAT team to my house at midnight.
translation.zh: 于是这个人让一支特警队深夜来到我家

translation.en: [Barriss] When I looked out my window, I noticed it was really bright outside,
translation.zh: 我望向窗外 发现外面一片白光

translation.en: like, really bright.
translation.zh: 亮得刺眼

translation.en: So then I walked out my room and opened the front door.
translation.zh: 于是我走出房间 打开了前门

translation.en: And it… I looked up in the sky and there was a helicopter.
translation.zh: 然后…我望向天空 天上有一架直升机

translation.en: The light was so bright that it was…
translation.zh: 灯光太亮了 照得…

translation.en: It seemed like it was mid-afternoon, that's how bright the light was.
translation.zh: 亮如白昼 就是这么亮

translation.en: [Barriss] Then shortly after, cop cars started pulling up,
translation.zh: 紧接着来了很多警车

translation.en: and they were getting out with shotguns and rifles.
translation.zh: 警察拿着散弹枪和来复枪下了车

translation.en: [Barriss] It was an eye-opening experience
translation.zh: 真是让人大开眼界

translation.en: that-- that he could do that to my house over nothing,
translation.zh: 他竟然可以无凭无据地对我的家做这种事

translation.en: ,'cause it was a hoax call. Whatever he said, wasn't true.
translation.zh: 那通电话是恶作剧 他说的不是真的

translation.en: He said that someone was being held hostage in the closet.
translation.zh: 他说有人质被关在储藏室

translation.en: I learned later that he even pretended to be
translation.zh: 后来我才知道 他甚至假扮

translation.en: the girl that was allegedly being held hostage in my closet.
translation.zh: 据称是被关在我家储藏室的那个女孩

translation.en: I wasn't scared for my life.
translation.zh: 我不担心自己会没命

translation.en: I didn't feel like I was gonna die or anything.
translation.zh: 我不觉得我有生命危险

translation.en: I just thought it was cool that he could do that.
translation.zh: 我只觉得挺酷的 他竟然能这样做

translation.en: [interviewer] You thought it was cool.
translation.zh: 你觉得挺酷？

translation.en: [Barriss] That's what I thought about that experience.
translation.zh: 对于这场经历 我是这样认为的

translation.en: Quite frankly, I was thinking, "Holy shit."
translation.zh: 说实话 我当时的反应是“我去”

translation.en: "This guy actually just sent the SWAT team to my house,
translation.zh: “这家伙居然能让特警队来我家

translation.en: and he's not worried at all about the consequences."
translation.zh: 而且完全不担心后果”

translation.en: [woman in phone recording] This call is from a federal prison.
translation.zh: 电话是从一座联邦监狱打出的

translation.en: [reporter 1] Now, if you've never heard of swatting…
translation.zh: 如果你从未听说过“特警恶搞”…

translation.en: Honestly, I hadn't until this story happened.
translation.zh: 说实话 之前我就没听说过

translation.en: [caller] I've got two people here held hostage, all right?
translation.zh: 我这里有两名人质被绑架了

translation.en: [reporter 1] It's when someone makes a prank call about a bogus crime
translation.zh: 意思是打恶作剧电话谎称有人正在犯罪

translation.en: to get the SWAT team to go to someone's house.
translation.zh: 让特警队前往某人的家中

translation.en: [reporter 2] An army of Nassau County SWAT teams
translation.zh: 大批拿骚县特警

translation.en: descended on a home, guns drawn.
translation.zh: 持枪突袭了一所住宅

translation.en: They thought they were responding to a double-murder,
translation.zh: 他们以为是来处置一起双重谋杀案

translation.en: and a suspect who had barricaded himself in the home.
translation.zh: 嫌犯躲在家中 设置了障碍

translation.en: [SWAT officer] Police department search warrant!
translation.zh: 警察 我们有搜查令！

translation.en: [reporter 2] But it all turned out to be a hoax.
translation.zh: 结果发现是一场恶作剧

translation.en: Down! Get on the ground!
translation.zh: 趴下！趴在地上！

translation.en: [reporter 3] The swatting targets are sometimes celebrities
translation.zh: 被恶搞的对象有时是名人

translation.en: like Rihanna and Justin Bieber,
translation.zh: 例如蕾哈娜和贾斯汀·比伯

translation.en: but are often online gamers.
translation.zh: 但一般是网络游戏玩家

translation.en: People making the false 911 calls and then watch live online.
translation.zh: 人们会报假警 然后在网上实时观看

translation.en: Swatting started as a way to, I think,
translation.zh: 特警恶搞的最初目的是为了

translation.en: disrupt gaming competitions.
translation.zh: 扰乱游戏比赛

translation.en: Or if they lose an important match, to get back at somebody else.
translation.zh: 或者是输掉一场重要比赛后的报复之举

translation.en: It goes back more than 20 years.
translation.zh: 这种事20多年前就出现了

translation.en: People playing a video game,
translation.zh: 玩电子游戏的人

translation.en: they call the police and mimic the person that they lost to,
translation.zh: 给警察打电话 冒充获胜的对手

translation.en: and say that they've killed family members
translation.zh: 说自己杀了家人

translation.en: and they see how many people they can get to come down.
translation.zh: 看看能让多少警察出动

translation.en: I come out of my room, they got guns pointed at me.
translation.zh: 我走出房间 他们拿枪指着我

translation.en: [chuckling] I'm like, "Oh my God, I'm gonna die."
translation.zh: 我心想“天啊 我要没命了”

translation.en: [Krebs] A lot of the people involved in swatting
translation.zh: 很多从事特警恶搞的人

translation.en: are doing this to somebody gaming online
translation.zh: 将网络游戏玩家作为目标

translation.en: and a whole bunch of people all over the world are watching it live.
translation.zh: 来自世界各地的很多人会实时观看

translation.en: You could tell them. You could tell them, actually.
translation.zh: 你来告诉他们吧

translation.en: It's not funny and it's like…
translation.zh: 这并不好玩 这…

translation.en: The takeaways is one thing,
translation.zh: 叫外卖是一回事 但这就…

translation.en: but this is, like, police who are saving lives.
translation.zh: 叫外卖是一回事 但这就… 警察是救人的

translation.en: -Um… -A waste of police time, whoever did it.
translation.zh: 不管是谁干的 这是浪费警察的时间

translation.en: Being able to send the police to kick in someone's door
translation.zh: 能让警察踹开别人的家门

translation.en: while this is all on camera,
translation.zh: 还能实时观看

translation.en: kind of ups the ante.
translation.zh: 让这些人乐此不疲

translation.en: People who perpetrate this are looking for bomb dogs, helicopters.
translation.zh: 干这种事的人希望看到搜爆犬、直升机

translation.en: That's all part of the "fun."
translation.zh: 这是乐趣的一部分

translation.en: Each swatting incident costs law enforcement on average $10,000.
translation.zh: 每一起特警恶搞事件会让执法机构平均耗费一万美元

translation.en: [Krebs] It's about being feared.
translation.zh: 目的是让别人怕自己

translation.en: It's about being known.
translation.zh: 为了出名

translation.en: Making the world acknowledge your presence.
translation.zh: 为了刷存在感

translation.en: For a lot of these individuals, any attention is good attention.
translation.zh: 在这些人当中 很多人认为只要能吸引关注就是好事

translation.en: Somebody cares enough about me to send the SWAT team to my house?
translation.zh: 有人很在乎我以至于让特警队来我家

translation.en: I must be important.
translation.zh: 这说明我很重要

translation.en: [reporter 4] But the FBI's biggest concern, that one day,
translation.zh: 但联邦调查局最担心的是 这种谎报犯罪的恶作剧有朝一日会变得致命

translation.en: these criminal crank calls will turn deadly.
translation.zh: 这种谎报犯罪的恶作剧有朝一日会变得致命

translation.en: And then we'll change her face, hair, and clothing.
translation.zh: 然后改变她的脸型、发型和衣服

translation.en: Let's go with Gigi, 'cause that's easy.
translation.zh: 就选吉吉吧 这样比较容易

translation.en: We'll do a random last name.
translation.zh: 随便选个姓就行了

translation.en: I play video games 'cause it's fun for me.
translation.zh: 我玩电子游戏是因为我觉得好玩

translation.en: You can be really creative with it sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时你可以发挥创意

translation.en: Oh my gosh. She looks crazy.
translation.zh: 老天 她太夸张了

translation.en: [chuckling] Look at her legs.
translation.zh: 你看她的腿

translation.en: What kind of power workouts are you doing?
translation.zh: 你平时做什么力量训练？

translation.en: I deal with anxiety and stuff like that.
translation.zh: 我用这种方式来缓解焦虑

translation.en: When you have anxiety, you tend to like revert in yourself
translation.zh: 当你焦虑的时候你一般会把注意力收回来

translation.en: and do things that feel better for you.
translation.zh: 做些让自己高兴的事

translation.en: And this feels better for me sometimes.
translation.zh: 玩游戏有时让我感到高兴

translation.en: Ooh, where should we go?
translation.zh: 我们去哪儿？

translation.en: Prettier houses in Oasis Springs.
translation.zh: 绿洲泉的房子更漂亮

translation.en: It starts off as, you know,
translation.zh: 最开始是因为

translation.en: you not wanting to deal with real life.
translation.zh: 你不想面对现实生活

translation.en: You get validation from the game,
translation.zh: 你在游戏中得到认可

translation.en: and, at some point it becomes addictive.
translation.zh: 慢慢你会上瘾

translation.en: You wanna get that validation over and over again.
translation.zh: 你想反复得到这种认可

translation.en: Look, my neighbors are coming to visit me,
translation.zh: 瞧 我的邻居来看我了

translation.en: which is not something that happens in real life.
translation.zh: 现实生活中不会有这种事

translation.en: If real life isn't making me feel good and this is,
translation.zh: 如果现实生活无法让我开心而玩游戏可以

translation.en: I'm gonna play this and spend a majority of my time doing this.
translation.zh: 我就会花很多时间玩游戏

translation.en: Okay, this is Tyler, and it's Christmas Day.
translation.zh: 好 我是泰勒 今天是圣诞节

translation.en: ["Jane Doe"] Really, the reason I started gaming was my friend, Tyler.
translation.zh: 我最初开始玩游戏是因为我的朋友泰勒

translation.en: And I just got something on camera that was… kind of entertaining.
translation.zh: 我发现了一些好玩的摄像头视频 （泰勒·巴里斯）

translation.en: ["Jane Doe"] We met when I was in the seventh grade,
translation.zh: 我是七年级的时候认识他的

translation.en: he taught me how to play games.
translation.zh: 他教我玩游戏

translation.en: He was the first boyfriend I ever had.
translation.zh: 他是我第一个男朋友

translation.en: ["Jane Doe"] He delved into the gaming community,
translation.zh: 他沉迷在游戏圈中

translation.en: and didn't really get outside of the house.
translation.zh: 很少出门

translation.en: His father died when he was younger.
translation.zh: 他小时候父亲死了

translation.en: His mother, she moved to Vegas and they lost contact.
translation.zh: 他妈妈搬到了维加斯他们失去了联系

translation.en: His grandmother, I know her as his mom,
translation.zh: 我以为他的祖母是他妈妈

translation.en: that's what he called her.
translation.zh: 因为他叫她妈妈

translation.en: But he wasn't the same online as he was in person.
translation.zh: 他在网上和在现实生活中判若两人

translation.en: [Koerner] Playing Halo, the Xbox game,
translation.zh: 泰勒很小的时候

translation.en: became the most important thing in Tyler's life at a very young age.
translation.zh: 玩Xbox游戏《光环》就成了他生活中最重要的事

translation.en: He had aspirations of becoming a professional Halo player.
translation.zh: 他立志要成为《光环》职业玩家

translation.en: [Krebs] People who are good at this,
translation.zh: 玩得好的人

translation.en: their name can be widely known very quickly.
translation.zh: 很快就会声名鹊起

translation.en: There are competitions all over the world
translation.zh: 全世界有各种各样的电竞比赛

translation.en: where people who basically do nothing
translation.zh: 让一些什么都不做

translation.en: but play a specific game or set of games,
translation.zh: 整天玩某款或某几款游戏的人

translation.en: come together and compete against each other.
translation.zh: 聚在一起一争高下

translation.en: [announcer] If he can continue to hold this down for just a couple more seconds,
translation.zh: 如果他能再坚持几秒钟

translation.en: a perfect kill for Royal2.
translation.zh: “皇家2号”的一记绝杀

translation.en: And that's gonna do it, folks! They are the Halo world champions.
translation.zh: 一锤定音！他们是《光环》世界冠军

translation.en: [Krebs] The top prizes for these can be just astronomical.
translation.zh: 获胜者将获得巨额奖金

translation.en: Endorsements, that kind of thing.
translation.zh: 还有代言费之类的

translation.en: You're gonna sit there behind your mother's computer screen…
translation.zh: 你将坐在你妈的电脑屏幕的后面…

translation.en: You ain't got shit to say, bitch!
translation.zh: 你屁都放不出来 贱人！

translation.en: [Koerner] There is coarseness to gaming culture.
translation.zh: 游戏文化存在粗俗的一面…

translation.en: [gamer 1] You dumb cunt.
translation.zh: 你这个傻逼

translation.en: Learn how to play a proper character, you fucking stupid whore.
translation.zh: 好好学学怎么玩吧 该死的傻逼

translation.en: There is a treatment of others, even that are friends, that can be quite harsh.
translation.zh: 即使是朋友之间 有时也会恶语相向

translation.en: -[gamer 2] Shut the fuck up-- -[gamer 3] Shut the fuck up piece of shit!
translation.zh: 他妈的闭嘴 那是… 你他妈闭嘴 垃圾！

translation.en: [Koerner] Slight infractions invite retaliation, name-calling.
translation.zh: 稍有不慎就会招致报复和辱骂

translation.en: Real harassment and abuse can be part of this.
translation.zh: 骚扰和辱骂可能成为游戏的一部分

translation.en: In the gaming culture that Tyler belonged to,
translation.zh: 在泰勒所属的游戏文化中

translation.en: to be extreme is something that's welcomed and invited.
translation.zh: 人们欢迎和鼓励极端的言行

translation.en: And extreme is also included with fun.
translation.zh: 极端言行也是乐趣的一部分

translation.en: [Koerner] These Halo acquaintances he had were really his closest friends.
translation.zh: 他在《光环》中认识的人是他最亲密的朋友

translation.en: Tyler Barriss was raised by Halo in many ways.
translation.zh: 从很多方面说泰勒·巴里斯是被《光环》抚养大的

translation.en: [interviewer] Tell me about how you got into this.
translation.zh: 说说你是如何开始的吧

translation.en: Like, what was your first bomb threat?
translation.zh: 你第一次制造炸弹威胁是什么情况？

translation.en: [Barriss] My first bomb threat or the first time I sent a SWAT team to someone's house?
translation.zh: 我的第一次炸弹威胁还是我第一次让特警队去别人家？

translation.en: [interviewer] Yeah, I assume the bomb threats came first, right?
translation.zh: 炸弹威胁应该在前面 对吧？

translation.en: [Barriss] Yeah, that was the first thing I ever tried was evacuating a building.
translation.zh: 是的 我第一次尝试是让一栋大楼被疏散

translation.en: The same person who swatted me sent the bomb squad to a school.
translation.zh: 恶搞我的人让一支拆弹队去了一所学校

translation.en: The first thing that I wanted to try to do was make headlines like that.
translation.zh: 我想做的第一件事就是这种能上头条的事

translation.en: I tried evacuating a college university.
translation.zh: 我试着让一所大学被疏散

translation.en: That was the first thing that I ever tried to evacuate
translation.zh: 这是我第一次尝试疏散

translation.en: and it was on the news the same day.
translation.zh: 当天就上了新闻

translation.en: At that point, I knew, "Okay, since that worked, this is legit."
translation.zh: 然后我就知道既然成功了 说明行得通

translation.en: Like, I could probably do this to any location in the United States.
translation.zh: 也许我可以对美国的任何一个地方做这种事

translation.en: It'll get evacuated as long as the call sounds believable.
translation.zh: 只要电话听起来可信那里就会被疏散

translation.en: Wherever I do this is going to get evacuated.
translation.zh: 不管我对什么地方下手那里都会被疏散

translation.en: [Koerner] So, Tyler starts to swat other people in the Halo community.
translation.zh: 于是泰勒开始恶搞其他《光环》玩家

translation.en: But not only that, starts making lots of bomb threat calls
translation.zh: 不仅如此 他还针对高中和初中

translation.en: to high schools and junior highs.
translation.zh: 大肆报假警制造炸弹威胁

translation.en: He would call up and say, "I've hidden a bomb in a locker."
translation.zh: 他会报警说：“我在一个储物柜中藏了一颗炸弹”

translation.en: And, of course, they had to close the school.
translation.zh: 当然 警察不得不关闭学校

translation.en: [Barriss] I had gone on a spree of evacuating high schools,
translation.zh: 我接连疏散了很多高中

translation.en: and I was just making it quite obvious on my Twitter
translation.zh: 我在推特上说得很明白

translation.en: that I'm evacuating numerous schools around the country.
translation.zh: 我要疏散全国各地数不清的学校

translation.en: And I have the ability to do this. And then I wanted to--
translation.zh: 我有能力做到 然后我想…

translation.en: [interviewer] This is a time in which there's a lot of school shootings.
translation.zh: 最近发生了多起校园枪击案

translation.en: Did that factor into your thinking?
translation.zh: 你是否考虑到了这个因素？

translation.en: [Barriss] I wasn't-- It had nothing to do with school shootings.
translation.zh: 我没有说…这跟校园枪击案无关

translation.en: I was saying there's bombs in the school, they're going to detonate.
translation.zh: 我说的是学校有炸弹 而且会被引爆

translation.en: I never tried to do no school shooting script or anything like that.
translation.zh: 我从未说过学校发生了枪击案之类的

translation.en: [interviewer] But people are on edge
translation.zh: 但大家都很紧张 因为全国各地

translation.en: because there are so many school shootings around the country.
translation.zh: 发生了这么多起校园枪击案

translation.en: Did that factor into your thinking?
translation.zh: 你是否考虑到了这个因素？

translation.en: [Barriss] That wasn't… that didn't make me think I was going to have
translation.zh: 这不是…这没有让我觉得

translation.en: any more success in having something evacuated.
translation.zh: 我有更大的把握疏散那些地方

translation.en: It wasn't a relevant factor in my mind.
translation.zh: 这并不是促使我这样做的因素

translation.en: [Barriss] It's the fact that I knew I was breaking the law
translation.zh: 我这样做是因为我知道我在犯法

translation.en: and I could get away with it.
translation.zh: 但我可以逃避惩罚

translation.en: And there was nothing they could do to stop me.
translation.zh: 而且他们没办法阻止我

translation.en: I could keep doing it.
translation.zh: 我可以继续做下去

translation.en: I could literally talk to law enforcement over the phone,
translation.zh: 我可以在电话上跟执法部门交谈

translation.en: lie to them, do something illegal,
translation.zh: 骗他们 做违法的事

translation.en: send them somewhere, have a place evacuated,
translation.zh: 让他们去疏散一些地方

translation.en: it's coming on the news and there was nothing they could do about it.
translation.zh: 然后会上新闻 他们对此毫无办法

translation.en: They couldn't find me, couldn't arrest me. Nothing they could do.
translation.zh: 他们找不到我 无法逮捕我他们什么都做不了

translation.en: So I could do that as much as I wanted.
translation.zh: 所以我可以随心所欲

translation.en: I was… I was like, unstoppable, you could say.
translation.zh: 我…可以说我不可阻挡

translation.en: ["Jane Doe"] A lot of people praised him.
translation.zh: 很多人称赞他

translation.en: People being like, "Wow, you're so cool,"
translation.zh: 有人说：“哇 你太酷了” 或者

translation.en: or, "Wow, can't believe you're doing this and not getting caught." Stuff like that.
translation.zh: “哇 难以置信你做这种事都不会被抓住”

translation.en: He's never had a job, doesn't have any working skills.
translation.zh: 他一直没有工作 没有任何工作技能

translation.en: He did not graduate from high school.
translation.zh: 他高中没有毕业

translation.en: Swatting was a way for him to earn notoriety.
translation.zh: 他把特警恶搞视为出名的途径

translation.en: It was about impressing other kids, or other gamers online
translation.zh: 为了让其他孩子或游戏玩家对他刮目相看

translation.en: and showing them that you could do other things online than just game.
translation.zh: 让他们知道 除了玩游戏你还能在网上干别的事

translation.en: I kind of had to tell him, like,
translation.zh: 我只能对他说

translation.en: "You don't really understand how the real world works."
translation.zh: “你不了解现实世界的规则”

translation.en: "People do get caught for the things that they do."
translation.zh: “干坏事的人一定会被抓到”

translation.en: [Koerner] Tyler's grandmother found it very difficult to understand him.
translation.zh: 泰勒的祖母觉得很难理解他

translation.en: There was a volatility to her relationship with Tyler.
translation.zh: 她和泰勒的关系时好时坏

translation.en: And she grew frightened of him.
translation.zh: 她对他逐渐产生了畏惧感

translation.en: [Koerner] In September of 2015,
his grandmother is watching KABC TV newscast in Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 他的祖母正在观看洛杉矶KABC电视台的新闻节目

translation.en: And he says to his grandmother,
translation.zh: 他对他的祖母说

translation.en: "Do you think I could clear out that building?"
translation.zh: “你觉得我能疏散那栋大楼吗？”

translation.en: [Barriss] This is when I had just started. I was sending the bomb squad to schools
translation.zh: 当时我刚开始恶搞 我把拆弹队骗到学校

translation.en: and having the schools evacuated just to have it come on the news.
translation.zh: 将学校疏散 只为了让这些事上新闻

translation.en: And I wanted to evacuate something kind of bigger.
translation.zh: 然后我想疏散更大的目标

translation.en: Instead of having the news report on a school that got evacuated,
translation.zh: 与其让新闻机构报道学校被疏散

translation.en: why don't I just evacuate the news studio itself?
translation.zh: 何不疏散新闻机构本身？

translation.en: It's unusual for those who report the news to become the news.
translation.zh: 报道新闻的人很少会成为新闻

translation.en: Well, that's what happened today to the staff at KABC, in Southern California.
translation.zh: 南加州KABC电视台的员工今天就遇到了这种事

translation.en: The station had to do its four o'clock newscast
translation.zh: 该电视台被迫在街道的草坪上

translation.en: from a lawn down the street
translation.zh: 播报下午4点的新闻

translation.en: after a bomb threat forced everyone in that building to evacuate.
translation.zh: 因为之前有炸弹威胁迫使所有人撤离了大楼

translation.en: [Barriss] They were actually broadcasting live on Channel 7 News
translation.zh: 我打电话时 他们正在播报

translation.en: when I made the phone call.
translation.zh: 第7频道新闻

translation.en: So I thought it would be interesting to make that call,
translation.zh: 于是我想 如果打个电话

translation.en: and watch the TV and see what happened on the TV.
translation.zh: 看看电视台如何报道 那会很好玩

translation.en: [reporter] A bomb squad and search dogs combed through the building,
translation.zh: 拆弹队和排爆犬仔细排查了大楼

translation.en: eventually ruling it safe to re-enter.
translation.zh: 最终认定安全 员工可以回到大楼

translation.en: [Koerner] Tyler's grandmother immediately suspects Tyler
translation.zh: 泰勒的祖母立刻怀疑是泰勒干的

translation.en: and confronts him. And says, "I know you did this."
translation.zh: 她质问他 还说：“我知道是你干的”

translation.en: He says, "Yes, I did it."
translation.zh: 他说：“没错 是我干的

translation.en: "But you will not tell another living soul
translation.zh: 但是不许告诉别人不然我就把你揍一顿

translation.en: or else I will beat you bloody and I will blow up our house."
translation.zh: 但是不许告诉别人不然我就把你揍一顿 然后把我们的房子炸掉”

translation.en: And she's terrified.
translation.zh: 她吓坏了

translation.en: However, she has a longtime friend who's a college police officer
translation.zh: 然而 她有一个老朋友是大学校警

translation.en: and she confides in him the fact that Tyler did this bomb threat.
translation.zh: 她向他吐露了实情说这次炸弹威胁是泰勒制造的

translation.en: [Dorroh] My primary job is,
translation.zh: 我的主要工作是…

translation.en: I'm an explosives investigator for the bomb squad.
translation.zh: 我是拆弹队的爆炸物调查员

translation.en: Back in September, October 2015,
translation.zh: 2015年的9月和10月

translation.en: there were a series of swatting incidents
translation.zh: 接连发生了多起特警恶搞事件

translation.en: that were being called in across the country.
translation.zh: 分布在全国各地

translation.en: There were also cases involving bomb threats,
translation.zh: 也有一些涉及炸弹威胁的案子

translation.en: and we weren't sure at the time if they were all related or not.
translation.zh: 当时我们不确定这些案子是否有关联

translation.en: But on September 29th,
translation.zh: 但9月29号那天

translation.en: I responded to two school bomb threats in the San Fernando Valley.
translation.zh: 我出警处置了两起圣费尔南多谷的校园炸弹威胁

translation.en: One was at a junior high, one was at an elementary school.
translation.zh: 目标是一所初中和一所小学

translation.en: We took the police reports,
translation.zh: 我们看了警方报告

translation.en: and then got in contact with the Glendale police officers.
translation.zh: 然后联系了格伦代尔市的警察

translation.en: They advised me that they had arrested a person by the name of Tyler Barriss
translation.zh: 他们告诉我说 他们逮捕了一个人名叫泰勒·巴里斯

translation.en: after calling in a bomb threat to the news stations there in Glendale.
translation.zh: 因为他报假警说格伦代尔的电视台有炸弹威胁

translation.en: That's the first time I heard his name.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次听说他的名字

translation.en: I had to take and piece together the forensic trail.
translation.zh: 我只能去搜集证据

translation.en: The first thing I did was met up with the 14-year-old student
translation.zh: 我首先去那所初中

translation.en: who took the telephone call at the office at the middle school.
translation.zh: 见到了当时在办公室接到电话的那名14岁学生

translation.en: We played the audio recordings for six different swatting calls that I had.
translation.zh: 我们播放了六段恶搞电话的录音

translation.en: And as soon as we hit the, uh, Tyler Barriss audio recordings,
translation.zh: 当我们播放泰勒·巴里斯的录音时 她立刻就…

translation.en: she was like… she knew exactly.
translation.zh: 当我们播放泰勒·巴里斯的录音时 她立刻就… 她很肯定 她确定就是他

translation.en: She was emphatic that was him.
translation.zh: 她很肯定 她确定就是他

translation.en: [Dorroh] Tyler Barriss has a distinctive voice.
translation.zh: 泰勒·巴里斯的声音很特别

translation.en: When I get these different calls, I typically give them a title
translation.zh: 拿到这些电话录音后我一般会给它们取个标题

translation.en: so I can keep them all.
translation.zh: 以便存档

translation.en: You know, "mush-mouth," "baritone." Something along those lines.
translation.zh: 例如“口齿不清”、“男中音”之类的

translation.en: With Tyler Barriss, I used the word "snide."
translation.zh: 对于泰勒·巴里斯的录音我取的标题是“阴险小人”

translation.en: [Koerner] Tyler became very adept at covering his tracks.
translation.zh: 泰勒非常擅于隐匿行踪

translation.en: He always used the voice over IP services
translation.zh: 他总是使用网络电话服务

translation.en: to call from numbers that would dead-end somewhere that was not connected to him.
translation.zh: 让警察无法追查电话号码也查不到他身上

translation.en: [Dorroh] We had tied him into a number of other cases across the country.
translation.zh: 我们将他跟全国各地的其他很多案件联系了起来

translation.en: We had five LAX bomb threats that he was responsible for.
translation.zh: 有五起针对洛杉矶国际机场的炸弹威胁都是他干的

translation.en: At one point I tied him into seven in one week.
translation.zh: 我曾在一周内将他跟七个案子联系起来

translation.en: He would change his script along the way,
translation.zh: 他每次都会编造不同的故事

translation.en: but it was the voice that we always came back to.
translation.zh: 但我们每次都能通过他的声音查到他

translation.en: [Koerner] They'd go and arrest Tyler at the house in Chatsworth.
translation.zh: 警察在位于查茨沃斯的家中逮捕了泰勒

translation.en: [Koerner] Ultimately, Tyler Barriss pleads no contest to the charges,
translation.zh: 最终 泰勒·巴里斯对指控没有异议

translation.en: and is sentenced to approximately two years in the Los Angeles County Jail.
translation.zh: 被判在洛杉矶县监狱服刑大约两年

translation.en: His grandmother, fearing for her own life,
translation.zh: 他的祖母担心自己有生命危险

translation.en: had taken out a restraining order against him.
translation.zh: 于是提出了针对他的限制令

translation.en: [Barriss] It was my first time ever being in jail. Everything was all new to me.
translation.zh: 那是我第一次进监狱一切都觉得很新鲜

translation.en: I wasn't worried or scared.
translation.zh: 我不担心 也不害怕

translation.en: It was more like, "Okay, well, my bail was a million dollars,
translation.zh: 我心想“好吧我的保释金要一百万美元

translation.en: and I'm stuck in this situation."
translation.zh: 我只能待在这里了”

translation.en: So, it just was what it was.
translation.zh: 只能随遇而安了

translation.en: I was just doing the time until I ended up getting out.
translation.zh: 安心服刑 等着出去

translation.en: I got released from the county jail after 16 months.
translation.zh: 16个月后 我从县监狱获释了

translation.en: It was 2:00 a.m. when I finally stepped foot outside.
translation.zh: 我走出监狱时是深夜两点

translation.en: I had nowhere to go.
translation.zh: 我无处可去

translation.en: I didn't have anywhere to stay. I didn't know anyone in LA.
translation.zh: 我没地方住我在洛杉矶一个人都不认识

translation.en: [Barriss] My grandmother, she had already told me not to go back.
translation.zh: 我祖母告诉过我 让我不要回去

translation.en: But I don't know how to be homeless
translation.zh: 但我不知道如何做个流浪汉

translation.en: and survive in the streets and do all that.
translation.zh: 如何在街头活下来

translation.en: I just went back to the only place that I knew, which was my house.
translation.zh: 我回到了我唯一熟悉的地方就是我的家

translation.en: All the doors were locked and I just camped out back all night,
translation.zh: 门全都锁住了 我在后院待了一晚

translation.en: until about 6:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 直到早上6点

translation.en: I've lived with her my whole life. I know what her routine is.
translation.zh: 我从小就跟她住在一起很了解她的生活规律

translation.en: I kind of just hung out in the backyard
translation.zh: 我在后院闲逛

translation.en: until she unlocked the back door to do some laundry.
translation.zh: 等她打开后门出来洗衣服

translation.en: And I just walked in the house.
translation.zh: 我就走了进去

translation.en: She was kind of shocked that I was there,
translation.zh: 看到我在那里 她很震惊

translation.en: and she told me that I wasn't supposed to be there.
translation.zh: 她跟我说我不能去那里

translation.en: He contacted the grandmother, a violation of the restraining order.
translation.zh: 他去找他的祖母 这违反了限制令

translation.en: And we put him right back in custody again.
translation.zh: 于是我们又把他关了起来

translation.en: Tyler lives in his own little world.
translation.zh: 泰勒活在自己的小世界里

translation.en: He doesn't have any real-world friends.
translation.zh: 他在现实世界中没有朋友

translation.en: He doesn't have any employers or anything along those lines.
translation.zh: 也没有雇主之类的

translation.en: So I think his only lifeline that he has is his grandmother
translation.zh: 他唯一的救命稻草就是他的祖母

translation.en: and he spoiled that relationship.
translation.zh: 但他毁掉了他们的关系

translation.en: [Koerner] Tyler was then in jail from January 2017 to August 2017.
translation.zh: 泰勒在狱中从2017年1月待到2017年8月

translation.en: It makes you really sad to, like, grow up with somebody
translation.zh: 这让人很难过 从小一起长大

translation.en: and be really close with them for such a long time,
translation.zh: 这么多年的好朋友

translation.en: and next thing you know, they're in jail and their whole life is upside-down,
translation.zh: 突然就进了监狱 人生就这么毁了

translation.en: and you don't recognize who's in front of you anymore.
translation.zh: 站在你面前 你都认不出来了

translation.en: We kind of lost contact and I moved on with my life.
translation.zh: 我们断了联系 我开始了新的生活

translation.en: [Koerner] When Tyler is released,
translation.zh: 泰勒出狱后

translation.en: he finds a homeless shelter to live in near Exposition Park in Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 他在洛杉矶的博览公园附近找到了一个流浪者收容所

translation.en: He ends up spending all his time going to a library near the homeless shelter.
translation.zh: 他整天泡在收容所附近的一个图书馆

translation.en: [Dorroh] He goes right back to doing what he believes he's singularly best at.
translation.zh: 他又干起了他认为自己唯一擅长的事

translation.en: [Dorroh] He was using his cell phone on the public Wi-Fi system to make these calls.
translation.zh: 他通过公共Wi-Fi网络用自己的手机打电话

translation.en: And he would do it for a variety of reasons.
translation.zh: 他这样做的原因多种多样

translation.en: Sometimes he would do it for pay.
translation.zh: 有时是为了挣钱

translation.en: [Koerner] This is a person who's never held a traditional job,
translation.zh: 这个人从未干过正经工作

translation.en: and maybe lacks a lot of the skills necessary to do so.
translation.zh: 可能也不具备相关的工作技能

translation.en: [interviewer] How much were you making per swat?
translation.zh: 你每次恶搞能挣多少钱？

translation.en: [Barriss] I was charging people depending on how much of a stranger they were to me,
translation.zh: 我根据对方与我的亲疏程度收费

translation.en: anywhere from $20 to $50 per swat.
translation.zh: 每次20到50美元不等

translation.en: But, quite frankly, I enjoyed the thrill of swatting.
translation.zh: 不过说实话我很享受特警恶搞带来的刺激

translation.en: I just enjoyed doing it.
translation.zh: 我很享受做这种事

translation.en: Having it appear on the news and then bragging about it on Twitter.
translation.zh: 让它登上新闻 然后在推特上吹嘘

translation.en: [interviewer] Yeah. [Barriss] I just, for whatever reason, enjoyed doing that.
translation.zh: 不管出于什么原因 总之我很享受

translation.en: [911 operator] Hi, what's going on?
translation.zh: 嗨 有什么事？

translation.en: [Barriss] My dad, he's going crazy, he's got his gun out.
translation.zh: 我爸发疯了 他把枪掏出来了 （2017年秋天）

translation.en: [Dorroh] He enjoyed swatting people. It was his form of entertainment.
translation.zh: 他喜欢恶搞别人 这是他的娱乐方式

translation.en: [Barriss] Yeah, I left some bombs at my high school
translation.zh: 是的 我在我的高中放了一些炸弹

translation.en: and they're gonna blow up in 15 minutes.
translation.zh: 15分钟后爆炸

translation.en: Just scared. I don't see why people would want to harm children.
translation.zh: 我很害怕 我不明白怎么会有人想要伤害孩子

translation.en: [Dorroh] He had about a dozen different Twitter handles.
translation.zh: 我想他有十多个推特帐户

translation.en: He would post links to the news stories on it,
translation.zh: 他会在推特上发布新闻链接

translation.en: you know, as "proof," taking credit for it.
translation.zh: 作为自己认领功劳的“证据”

translation.en: [reporter] We have new information on the bomb threat that led to an evacuation
translation.zh: 关于导致达拉斯会展中心 紧急疏散的炸弹威胁

translation.en: of the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center.
translation.zh: 我们有了新的线索

translation.en: [man] We heard an alarm go off, like, ten times?
translation.zh: 我们听见警铃响了…十次？

translation.en: And they're like, "We need you to leave."
translation.zh: 然后他们让我们离开

translation.en: [Dorroh] During the time period that he was out of custody,
translation.zh: 在他没有坐牢的那段时间

translation.en: we found approximately 37 other cases
translation.zh: 我们又发现了37起

translation.en: that he had called in bomb threats or swattings.
translation.zh: 他谎称有炸弹威胁或特警恶搞的案件

translation.en: [Barriss] I'm upset with some people.
translation.zh: 一些人让我很生气

translation.en: They got me mad, so now they're going to pay for it.
translation.zh: 他们让我很生气现在他们将付出代价

translation.en: And I also have a gun too.
translation.zh: 而且我有枪

translation.en: [Dorroh] He was like a one-man wrecking crew.
translation.zh: 他就像是单人爆破队

translation.en: He was just out of control.
translation.zh: 他完全失控了

translation.en: [Koerner] A couple weeks later,
translation.zh: 几周后

translation.en: the Federal Communications Commission in Washington, DC
translation.zh: 位于华盛顿特区的联邦通信委员会

translation.en: is having a very key meeting about the future of net neutrality.
translation.zh: 正在召开一个关于网络中立的重要会议

translation.en: [Barriss] The FCC, broadcasting the vote on net neutrality live on Twitter
translation.zh: 联邦通信委员会在推特上直播网络中立投票表决

translation.en: had like 160,000 viewers, at the time.
translation.zh: 有大约16万人观看

translation.en: And it was a federal building,
translation.zh: 那是联邦政府的大楼

translation.en: a little bit more high profile than some of my other evacuations.
translation.zh: 比我干过的其他一些疏散恶搞更引人瞩目

translation.en: So I posted on Twitter that I was gonna evacuate that building.
translation.zh: 于是我在推特上说要疏散那栋大楼

translation.en: On advice of security, we need to take a brief recess.
translation.zh: （阿吉特·派 委员会主席） 根据保安的建议 我们要暂时休会

translation.en: [Koerner] This is a huge issue the FCC is considering, of national importance.
translation.zh: 联邦通信委员会正在商议国家大事

translation.en: And Tyler is well aware of the importance to his community,
translation.zh: 泰勒很清楚这件事对于他这个群体的重要性

translation.en: to gamers in particular.
translation.zh: 尤其是对于游戏玩家

translation.en: And once again, he takes credit for this and laughs about it.
translation.zh: 但他再次认领功劳并冷嘲热讽

translation.en: He takes great pride that his power now extends to the halls of government.
translation.zh: 他觉得很自豪现在他的能量延伸到了政府议事厅

translation.en: [Barriss] I wasn't trying to scare them out of voting or whatever was going on.
translation.zh: 我不是想吓唬他们 让他们不敢投票

translation.en: That didn't concern me.
translation.zh: 我不关心那个

translation.en: I just knew it was gonna bring my Twitter a lot of attention.
translation.zh: 我只知道这会让很多人关注我的推特

translation.en: And my Twitter was quite popular that day.
translation.zh: 那天我的推特非常火

translation.en: Gamers and hackers and people doing dark criminal stuff online.
translation.zh: 游戏玩家、黑客在网上暗中从事犯罪活动的人

translation.en: My Twitter was quite popular in that scene of individuals.
translation.zh: 我的推特在这些人当中很受欢迎

translation.en: Whoever it is running this Twitter is swatting and evacuating everything.
translation.zh: 这个推特帐号的主人正在恶搞和疏散一切

translation.en: [Dorroh] Since 2014, I had been investigating swatting cases more and more.
translation.zh: 我从2014年开始越来越多地调查特警恶搞案件

translation.en: We all recognized, even the gaming community recognized it,
translation.zh: 我们都认识到就连游戏玩家都认识到了

translation.en: as a dangerous practice.
translation.zh: 这种行为很危险

translation.en: But we never had that fatality and we were just kind of waiting for it.
translation.zh: 但是从未死过人我们在等着这一天到来

translation.en: We knew it was going to happen.
translation.zh: 我们知道这一天会来的

translation.en: [Koerner] On December 28, 2017,
Shane Gaskill, who lives in Wichita, Kansas,
translation.zh: 住在堪萨斯州威奇托的肖恩·加斯基尔

translation.en: is playing Call of Duty with another gamer named Casey Viner,
translation.zh: 在跟住在辛辛那提郊区的另一位游戏玩家凯西·维纳

translation.en: who lives outside Cincinnati.
translation.zh: 一起玩《使命召唤》

translation.en: They're playing on a site where you can actually win small amounts of money for winning one of these games.
translation.zh: 他们是在一个网站上玩获胜者将赢得一笔小钱

translation.en: In the midst of all this violent chaos,
translation.zh: 在一片充满暴力的混乱中

translation.en: Shane Gaskill accidentally shoots Casey Viner's character to death.
translation.zh: 肖恩·加斯基尔不小心击毙了凯西·维纳的角色

translation.en: [Koerner] They lose the game
translation.zh: 他们输掉了游戏

translation.en: and don't get the $1.50 wager that had been placed on the game.
translation.zh: 未能获得押在这局游戏上的1.5美元赌注

translation.en: Shane and Casey get into a huge dispute about this online,
translation.zh: 肖恩和凯西为此在网上大吵了一架

translation.en: and Casey decides that he wants to take revenge on Shane Gaskill.
translation.zh: 凯西决定报复肖恩·加斯基尔

translation.en: Casey knew exactly where to go.
translation.zh: 凯西很清楚该去哪里找他

translation.en: And so he contacted "SWAuTistic" as Tyler was known online.
translation.zh: 他联系了“特警恶搞达人”这是泰勒的网名

translation.en: [Koerner] Shane Gaskill saw that "SWAuTistic" was now following him
translation.zh: 肖恩·加斯基尔看见“特警恶搞达人”关注了他

translation.en: to collect information.
translation.zh: 想要收集信息

translation.en: And then Shane Gaskill sent a direct message to Tyler Barriss.
translation.zh: 肖恩·加斯基尔随即给泰勒·巴里斯发了一条私信

translation.en: "Please try some shit. I'll be waiting."
translation.zh: “放马过来吧 我等着”

translation.en: "1033 West McCormick Street, Wichita, Kansas."
translation.zh: “堪萨斯州 威奇托西麦考密克街1033号”

translation.en: This is a person telling the ostensibly most feared swatter
translation.zh: 这是在告诉这个表面上很害怕的恶搞者

translation.en: that he doesn't have the balls to go through with it.
translation.zh: 他没有胆量付诸行动

translation.en: Tyler kind of had a God complex. His ego was really big.
translation.zh: 泰勒有一种上帝情结 他非常自负

translation.en: [Barriss] People are actually ignorant and arrogant enough to give you their address
translation.zh: 竟然有人如此无知和傲慢把他们的地址告诉你

translation.en: and tell you to come do something.
translation.zh: 还让你放马过来

translation.en: [911 operator] This is 911. What's going on?
translation.zh: 这里是911 有什么事？

translation.en: [Barriss] My mom and dad, they were arguing and I shot him in the head.
translation.zh: 我妈和我爸吵架我开枪打中了他的头

translation.en: And he's not breathing anymore.
translation.zh: 现在他没有呼吸了

translation.en: [911 operator] Do you have any weapons on you?
translation.zh: 好 你身上有武器吗？

translation.en: [Barriss] Yeah, I do. A handgun.
translation.zh: 是的 有 一把手枪

translation.en: [911 operator] Okay. What's your address?
translation.zh: 好 你住在哪里？

translation.en: [Barriss] It's 1033 West McCormick Street.
translation.zh: 西麦考密克街1033号

translation.en: [Koerner] The problem is, Shane Gaskill had given the wrong address.
translation.zh: 问题是肖恩·加斯基尔给的是错误的地址

translation.en: It wasn't Shane's house.
translation.zh: 那不是肖恩的家

translation.en: And the people who actually lived in the house at that time
translation.zh: 当时住在那栋房子里的

translation.en: was the Finch family.
translation.zh: 是芬奇一家

translation.en: [Francis Finch] Andrew Finch is my mom's brother.
translation.zh: 安德鲁·芬奇是我的舅舅

translation.en: October 27th, 2002,
my mother got into a car crash
translation.zh: 我妈出了车祸

translation.en: on her way to Texas to get me and my sister.
translation.zh: 当时她开车去德州接我和妹妹

translation.en: She rolled three times in her truck and was pronounced dead on scene.
translation.zh: 她在车里翻了三圈 当场宣布死亡

translation.en: I was like one or two, I believe. Andrew was like, maybe 16 or 17.
translation.zh: 当时我才一两岁 安德鲁是16或17岁

translation.en: I believe that he had felt he had a duty to take care of me and my sister.
translation.zh: 我想他感觉自己有义务照顾我和妹妹

translation.en: He taught me a lot of the things that I know now.
translation.zh: 他教会了我很多东西

translation.en: And that's why I regard him as my father
translation.zh: 所以我把他视为父亲

translation.en: is because I feel like a father's duty
translation.zh: 因为我觉得父亲的责任

translation.en: is to teach a young man how to… be a man in life.
translation.zh: 就是教年轻人如何在生活中做一个男人

translation.en: [Ali Abdelhadi] Andy actually cooked dinner for us.
translation.zh: 安迪为我们做了晚饭

translation.en: That day he made pasta with tomato sauce with cheese
translation.zh: 那天他做了番茄酱芝士意面

translation.en: and big pork chops.
translation.zh: 还有大块猪排

translation.en: We were just relaxing, chilling,
translation.zh: 我们在消遣时光

translation.en: because it was just a few days past Christmas.
translation.zh: 因为圣诞节刚过去几天

translation.en: There was a paved alley right against the house
translation.zh: 我家旁边有一条小巷

translation.en: where there was this huge pothole.
translation.zh: 路面有一个巨大的水坑

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] When I heard one vehicle, didn't seem odd. It happens all the time.
translation.zh: 我听见有一辆车 这不奇怪 这很常见

translation.en: [Lisa] Andy got up to see who was there.
translation.zh: 安迪站起来 去看是谁

translation.en: By this point, police had surrounded the house.
translation.zh: 这时候警察已经包围了那栋房子

translation.en: And Andrew opens the door
translation.zh: 安德鲁打开门

translation.en: and he's caught by police lights,
translation.zh: 被警灯晃得睁不开眼

translation.en: officers all over to the east of the house,
translation.zh: 房子的东侧 房子的西侧

translation.en: to the west of the house, directly in front of the house.
translation.zh: 房子的正面 到处都是警察

translation.en: [Lisa] He didn't know who was there for him. You know, he didn't know.
translation.zh: 他不知道谁在外面 他不知道

translation.en: [officer 1] Hey, front door! Hands!
translation.zh: -嘿 前门！-举起手来！

translation.en: -[officer 2] Show your hands! -[officer 1] He's right there.
translation.zh: -举起手来！-他在那里

translation.en: [officer 3] Walk this way!
translation.zh: 往这边走！

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] I started hearing commands from everywhere.
translation.zh: 我听见警察的命令从四面八方传来

translation.en: I didn't exactly make them out.
translation.zh: 我听不清他们说什么

translation.en: Shouting.
translation.zh: 是吼叫声

translation.en: [Haze] And in the seven seconds of opening the door,
translation.zh: 然后在开门七秒后

translation.en: an officer pulled the trigger on his AR-15…
translation.zh: 一名警察扣动了步枪的板机…

translation.en: …and shot Andrew once from, I believe, it was 67 yards away.
translation.zh: 从61米开外一枪击中了安德鲁

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] He was on his face, barely able to breathe.
translation.zh: 他趴在地上 呼吸困难

translation.en: And on his face and laid out in front of the front door
translation.zh: 脸朝下 脚在门外

translation.en: to the inside of the house.
translation.zh: 身体在屋内

translation.en: That's when Lisa came out.
translation.zh: 这时莉莎走了出来

translation.en: She goes, "I heard Andy scream. What's going on?"
translation.zh: 她说：“我听见安迪在尖叫出什么事了？”

translation.en: I said, "I don't know. I'm getting ready to find out."
translation.zh: 我说：“不知道 我去看看”

translation.en: I'm looking at him, possibly dying,
translation.zh: 我看着他 可能已经奄奄一息了

translation.en: couldn't tell her that.
translation.zh: 没敢告诉她

translation.en: Figured the next shot might be coming at me.
translation.zh: 担心下一枪可能会冲我来

translation.en: I didn't know who was shooting.
translation.zh: 我不知道是谁在开枪

translation.en: And then they're on their intercom saying,
translation.zh: 然后他们用对讲机说

translation.en: "Everyone get out from the east side."
translation.zh: “所有人从东侧出来”

translation.en: [Lisa] Telling us to come out with our hands up.
translation.zh: 叫我们举起手走出去

translation.en: [Haze] Dispatch was actually still on the phone with Tyler at this point.
translation.zh: 这时候泰勒还在跟接线员通话

translation.en: Tyler actually stayed on the phone with 911 for 16 minutes after the shooting.
translation.zh: 警察开枪后 泰勒还跟911说了16分钟

translation.en: -[Barriss] Hello? -[911 operator] I'm still here, okay?
translation.zh: -喂？-我还在 好吗？

translation.en: [Barriss] Yeah, me too.
translation.zh: 好的 我也是

translation.en: [Haze] Despite them still being on phone with the alleged hostage-taker,
translation.zh: 尽管他们仍在跟所谓的劫持人质者通话

translation.en: the family was dragged outside, barefoot, handcuffed.
translation.zh: 一家人还是被拖到了外面光着脚 戴着手铐

translation.en: The family was basically treated as criminals,
translation.zh: 警方冲进房子后

translation.en: while WPD tore through the house.
translation.zh: 将这家人当作罪犯对待

translation.en: [Barriss] My dad isn't breathing.
translation.zh: 我爸爸没有呼吸了

translation.en: It's kind of giving me anxiety and making me, like, paranoid.
translation.zh: 这让我有点紧张 让我有点疑神疑鬼

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] They kept asking us, "Who else is up there?"
translation.zh: 他们不停地问我们：“上面还有什么人？”

translation.en: So we're confused at that point.
translation.zh: 当时我们很困惑

translation.en: We didn't know what happened, why they were there.
translation.zh: 我们不知道出了什么事警察为什么会来

translation.en: I kept saying, "Why are you guys here?"
translation.zh: 我一直问：“你们来干什么?”

translation.en: But their confusion was even more than our confusion.
translation.zh: 但他们比我们更困惑

translation.en: They couldn't tell us what's going on.
translation.zh: 他们也说不清是怎么回事

translation.en: They kept asking who else was in the house.
translation.zh: 只是一个劲地问我们屋里还有谁

translation.en: [Francis] I was at my friend Isaac's house
translation.zh: 当时我在我的朋友艾萨克家

translation.en: and I started getting these texts, like, "Are you okay?"
translation.zh: 我开始收到短信 问我“你没事吧？”

translation.en: "There's cops at your house." "Hey, are you good?"
translation.zh: “警察去你家了 嘿 你没事吧？”

translation.en: "Do you know what's going on?"
translation.zh: “你知道是怎么回事吗？”

translation.en: I'm just, "I don't know. I'm not at my house right now."
translation.zh: 我只能回答：“我不知道 我现在不在家”

translation.en: And then like an hour goes by, maybe two,
translation.zh: 然后过了一两个小时

translation.en: articles start coming out, "Man shot at 1033 West McCormick."
translation.zh: 开始出现新闻报道“西麦考密克街1033号有人中枪”

translation.en: "Unidentified man shot at--"
translation.zh: “不明身份的男人中枪…”

translation.en: I almost-- like, the moment I saw "Man shot at…" I…
translation.zh: 我几乎…一看见“男人中枪…” 我…

translation.en: I almost knew, like, automatically.
translation.zh: 我几乎立马就明白了

translation.en: And that's when I found out it was him.
translation.zh: 我知道中枪的人是他

translation.en: I just like, dropped down to my knees at that point,
translation.zh: 我一下就跪在了地上

translation.en: not being able to breathe.
translation.zh: 无法呼吸

translation.en: I remember… almost forgetting, like, to inhale.
translation.zh: 我仿佛忘记了吸气

translation.en: I just sat there in disbelief.
translation.zh: 就那样难以置信地坐在那里

translation.en: [Haze] Andrew's niece Adelina lived with the family.
translation.zh: 安德鲁的外甥女阿德琳娜跟家人住在一起

translation.en: I believe she was 17 at the time of the shooting.
translation.zh: 事发时她应该是17岁

translation.en: She was actually forced to step over Andrew
translation.zh: 她被迫迈过安德鲁的身体

translation.en: as he was laying on the floor, bleeding out and gasping for air.
translation.zh: 当时他躺在地上血流不止 艰难地喘息着

translation.en: [Francis] They left him there on the ground until all of it was over with.
translation.zh: 他们任由他躺在地上 直到一切结束

translation.en: So she had to walk over his body,
translation.zh: 所以她只能迈过他的身体

translation.en: and look at him and see him,
translation.zh: 看着他

translation.en: and then get handcuffed outside.
translation.zh: 然后在外面被戴上了手铐

translation.en: [Haze] Andrew laid there for roughly 15 to 20 minutes
translation.zh: 安德鲁在那里躺了大约15到20分钟

translation.en: before receiving any medical attention whatsoever.
translation.zh: 然后才得到救治

translation.en: Officers were actually told to not move the body,
translation.zh: 有人告诉那些警察不要挪动他的身体

translation.en: and step over him,
translation.zh: 从他身上迈过去

translation.en: and ambulance was on-scene, and the ambulance was held back.
translation.zh: 救护车到了以后警察不许救护车靠近

translation.en: Instead of going to the hospital with their family member,
translation.zh: 他们没能陪家人去医院

translation.en: they were taken downtown for questioning.
translation.zh: 而是被带到市内接受问讯

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] In the interrogation room, the detective said,
translation.zh: 在审讯室 那个探长问

translation.en: "Would you know of someone that is holding a grudge against you or the house
translation.zh: “你知道有谁对你或你的家人怀恨在心

translation.en: that would actually make a false call to create chaos?"
translation.zh: 以至于报假警制造混乱吗？”

translation.en: I said, "Not necessarily, no, why?"
translation.zh: 我说：“应该没有 怎么了？”

translation.en: "You haven't told me, how is Andy?"
translation.zh: “你们还没告诉我安迪怎么样了”

translation.en: "'Cause I know when I saw him inside the house,
translation.zh: “我在屋内看到他时

translation.en: he was having a hard time breathing."
translation.zh: 他呼吸困难”

translation.en: "Did he get better? Did they take him to the hospital?"
translation.zh: “他好点了吗？他们送他去医院了吗？”

translation.en: He said, "I am very sorry, Ali, but he did not survive his wounds."
translation.zh: 他说：“我很遗憾 阿里他伤重不治了”

translation.en: [Lisa] I did not cry. I did not get hysterical.
translation.zh: 我没有哭 我没有歇斯底里

translation.en: I became determined
translation.zh: 我下定决心

translation.en: and was going to do what I needed to
translation.zh: 要不惜一切代价

translation.en: to make sure this was handled.
translation.zh: 追查到底

translation.en: For justice.
translation.zh: 为了讨回公道

translation.en: You know, I didn't know if I was going to be able to uphold myself
translation.zh: 这件事之后 我不知道

translation.en: as a human being after that day.
translation.zh: 作为一个凡人 我能否撑得住

translation.en: [Koerner] About an hour and a half after Andy Finch was shot,
translation.zh: 安迪·芬奇中枪一个半小时后

translation.en: Shane Gaskill sent a Twitter DM to Tyler.
translation.zh: 肖恩·加斯基尔在推特上给泰勒发了一条私信

translation.en: "This shit has me dying. They showed up to my old house, retard."
translation.zh: “笑死我了警察去了我以前住的地方 白痴”

translation.en: To him this was the funniest thing ever,
translation.zh: 他觉得这件事非常好玩

translation.en: that he basically duped the notorious Tyler Barriss
translation.zh: 他诱使大名鼎鼎的泰勒·巴里斯

translation.en: into swatting the wrong house.
translation.zh: 将特警队骗到了错误的地方

translation.en: Upon revealing this, Tyler defends himself and says,
translation.zh: 发现自己上当后 泰勒自我辩解到

translation.en: "You gave an address that you don't live at,
translation.zh: “你给了我一个假地址

translation.en: but you were acting tough, LOL, so you're a bitch."
translation.zh: 还有脸故作强硬太好笑了 你太贱了”

translation.en: Gaskill said, "Anyways, good job, but you failed the mission
translation.zh: 加斯基尔说：“无论如何干得漂亮 但你的任务失败了

translation.en: because I trolled the fuck outta you guys."
translation.zh: 因为我把你们耍了”

translation.en: And they have a petty dispute over who has bragging rights,
translation.zh: 然后他们开始争论谁有权吹嘘

translation.en: who emerged victorious in this scenario.
translation.zh: 这种情况算谁获胜

translation.en: Right now, a false 911 call led to a deadly officer-involved shooting in…
translation.zh: 一起报假警造成了一次致命的警员枪击…

translation.en: [Koerner] A couple hours later,
translation.zh: 几小时后

translation.en: the local newscast in Wichita start carrying reports about this death
translation.zh: 威奇托当地的新闻节目开始报道 发生在西麦考密克街的死亡事件

translation.en: on West McCormick Street.
translation.zh: 发生在西麦考密克街的死亡事件

translation.en: And Gaskill realizes what's happened.
translation.zh: 加斯基尔这才知道发生了什么事

translation.en: And so he reaches out to both Tyler and Casey Viner and says,
translation.zh: 于是他联系泰勒和凯西·维纳说

translation.en: "You guys need to delete everything. This is a murder case now."
translation.zh: “你们必须把一切删掉现在变成谋杀案了”

translation.en: [Haze] We were actually trying to identify Tyler before the FBI did.
translation.zh: 其实我们比联邦调查局更早试着揭开泰勒的身份

translation.en: I understand social media and the Internet pretty well, so,
translation.zh: 我非常了解社交媒体和互联网 所以

translation.en: that was probably 30 minutes of actually constructing what happened.
translation.zh: 只需大约30分钟我就能弄清事情经过

translation.en: He was decent at hiding his real name,
translation.zh: 他很会掩盖他的真名

translation.en: but he was not good at hiding his digital footprint whatsoever.
translation.zh: 但他不擅长掩盖他的数字足迹

translation.en: There were accounts that he would just pop back and forth through,
translation.zh: 他会换着使用一些账号

translation.en: with "SWAuTistic" and "GoredTutor36" being the two main ones.
translation.zh: 其中两个主要帐号是“特警恶搞达人”和“被刺伤的导师36”

translation.en: I finally reached out to the "GoredTutor36" account,
translation.zh: 最后我联系上了“被刺伤的导师36”

translation.en: and said "Any chance you would like to talk to us about last night's swat?"
translation.zh: 我说：“可以跟我们说说昨晚的恶搞吗？”

translation.en: "We really do want to hear your side."
translation.zh: “我们很想听听你怎么说”

translation.en: Tyler actually responded with, "Hmm. Hi. Here's my story."
translation.zh: 泰勒回复说：“嗯 嗨 我的说法是这样的”

translation.en: And he produced a screenshot
translation.zh: 然后他制作了一张截图

translation.en: that was actually Shane Gaskill encouraging him and egging him on
translation.zh: 那是肖恩·加斯基尔煽动和怂恿他的话

translation.en: and giving him a previous address that his family had lived at.
translation.zh: 并把他家之前的住址给了他

translation.en: Basically, that was Tyler saying that Shane encouraged him
translation.zh: 泰勒的意思是肖恩煽动他

translation.en: to swat that address.
translation.zh: 对那个地址进行恶搞

translation.en: And I said, "I understand that, but why did he send it to you?"
translation.zh: 我说：“这我知道但他为什么要把地址发给你？”

translation.en: "Like is it a paying gig or just entertainment value?"
translation.zh: “是有人出钱让你这么做还是纯粹为了好玩？”

translation.en: "How did you even get into swatting?"
translation.zh: “你是怎么喜欢上特警恶搞的？”

translation.en: And he put, "I was swatted once."
translation.zh: 他说：“我被恶搞过一次”

translation.en: I put, "No shit. What happened with that?"
translation.zh: 我说：“不是吧？结果如何？”

translation.en: And he put, "Well, I didn't die."
translation.zh: 他说：“我没死”

translation.en: Man, he's a fucking little prick.
translation.zh: 老天 他是个该死的小混蛋

translation.en: I don't even put the full blame on him, but, man…
translation.zh: 我并不完全责怪他 但是…

translation.en: He's just such a little fucking prick.
translation.zh: 他是个该死的小混蛋

translation.en: -Just that one sentence. "I didn't die." -[interviewer] "I didn't die."
translation.zh: 从那句话就看出来了 “我没死” 我没死

translation.en: After he knows, by the way, that someone did die in this circumstance.
translation.zh: 在他知道这次有人死掉之后

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [Haze] When word got out that these three gamers
translation.zh: 当大家听说这三个游戏玩家

translation.en: got an innocent man killed by doing a swatting,
translation.zh: 玩特警恶搞害死了一个无辜的人

translation.en: the Internet responded
translation.zh: 网上炸开了锅

translation.en: and they were not happy about what had happened.
translation.zh: 他们对这件事感到不满

translation.en: He even made a post saying,
translation.zh: 他甚至发帖子说

translation.en: "Hypothetically speaking, let's say I just kill myself right now
translation.zh: “假设为了让你们解气

translation.en: for the purpose of this getting through your guys' heads."
translation.zh: 我现在自杀”

translation.en: "Will justice have been served?"
translation.zh: “这样正义就得到伸张了吗？”

translation.en: One user responded, "I would be happier."
translation.zh: 一名用户回答说：“我会比现在开心”

translation.en: Another one responded, "You won't be missed."
translation.zh: 另一个人回答说：“不会有人怀念你”

translation.en: "You were the cause."
translation.zh: “你是罪魁祸首”

translation.en: "Going to jail, bro."
translation.zh: “去坐牢吧 老兄”

translation.en: "Lol I got someone killed but It's Just A Prank Bro
translation.zh: “哈哈 我害死了一个人但这只是一场恶作剧 兄弟

translation.en: so it's perfectly fine."
translation.zh: 所以完全没关系”

translation.en: That's actually a pretty good summary of how he tried to play it off.
translation.zh: 这就是他试着平息事态的方法

translation.en: [Koerner] A tremendous amount of abuse is hurled his way.
translation.zh: 他遭到了很多人的谩骂

translation.en: And so when a big YouTube star reaches out to him,
translation.zh: 所以当一位油管大咖联系他时

translation.en: he consents to be interviewed.
translation.zh: 他同意接受采访

translation.en: [Keemstar] Ladies and gentlemen, we have the alleged swatter on here, "SWAuTistic."
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 我们请来了据说是这次恶搞的操纵者 “特警恶搞达人”

translation.en: So you swatted that address. Correct?
translation.zh: 是你恶搞了那个地址 对吧？ （基姆明星油管播主 “闹剧警告”）

translation.en: -[Barriss] Sure. -And then this guy gets killed.
translation.zh: -是的-然后有个人被杀了

translation.en: [Barriss] That's what happened, I guess.
translation.zh: 好像是的

translation.en: And you said this on Twitter.
translation.zh: 你在推特上这样说

translation.en: You said, "I didn't get anyone killed because I didn't discharge a weapon."
translation.zh: 你说：“我没有害死任何人因为我没有开枪”

translation.en: Do you take any responsibility for what happened?
translation.zh: 你觉得你对这件事负有责任吗？

translation.en: [Barriss] Um, the argument can be made that the police would've never showed up
translation.zh: 可以这样说 如果我没有打那通电话

translation.en: if I didn't make the call.
translation.zh: 警察就不会出现

translation.en: However, I don't believe that I'm the only guilty party involved in this whole incident,
translation.zh: 但我觉得在整个事件中有罪的人不止我一个

translation.en: considering I was contacted and almost instructed to swat,
translation.zh: 考虑到是别人找到我 指使我恶搞

translation.en: and taunted to swat that address,
translation.zh: 挑唆我恶搞那个地址

translation.en: you could point the finger at the cop who killed someone,
translation.zh: 你可以指责那个杀人的警察

translation.en: at the guy who made the call,
translation.zh: 你可以指责打电话的人

translation.en: at the person who provided the address,
translation.zh: 你可以指责提供地址 并且说

translation.en: saying, "Oh, look, this is where I live. Go ahead and swat me!"
translation.zh: “瞧 这是我的住址来恶搞我吧！”的那个人

translation.en: Uh, so it's really debatable.
translation.zh: 所以这其实值得商榷

translation.en: [Dorroh] I recognized Tyler Barriss's voice right off the bat.
translation.zh: 我立马就认出了泰勒·巴里斯的声音

translation.en: I had five investigators all huddle around my phone
translation.zh: 有五名调查员就围在我的手机旁

translation.en: and we're sitting there watching it on my department phone.
translation.zh: 我们坐在那里 用我的手机观看

translation.en: [Barriss] It really sucks being connected to this incident in any fucking way,
translation.zh: 我太倒霉了 跟这种事扯在一起

translation.en: and if I could rewind, I would, 'cause this is all stupid.
translation.zh: 如果再来一次我不会这样做 因为这太蠢了

translation.en: It fit into his profile wanting to brag, wanting the recognition, everything.
translation.zh: 这符合他想要吹嘘渴望得到认可的心理特征

translation.en: Are you worried that they'll find you?
translation.zh: 你担心他们会找到你吗?

translation.en: That the FBI will find you and you'll be arrested and charged for this?
translation.zh: 担心联邦调查局找到你将你逮捕并提出指控吗？

translation.en: [Barriss] Currently, not so much.
translation.zh: 目前不太担心

translation.en: [Koerner] One person posts on Twitter
translation.zh: 有人在推特上发文

translation.en: that they know that this is the same person responsible
translation.zh: 说他知道2015年针对

translation.en: for the KABC TV bomb threats in 2015,
translation.zh: KABC电视台的炸弹威胁就是这个人干的

translation.en: and the police are already investigating this.
translation.zh: 而且警察已经在调查了

translation.en: And they could see on his Twitter feed,
translation.zh: 可以在他的推特上看到

translation.en: he's taking direct responsibility for what occurred on West McCormick Street.
translation.zh: 他承认西麦考密克街那件事是他干的

translation.en: So, it doesn't take much detective work to have a prime suspect in this case.
translation.zh: 所以这个案子不需要过多调查就能确定头号嫌犯了

translation.en: [Dorroh] The surveillance team went to his address that was listed on his California ID card,
translation.zh: 监视组去到他的加州身份证上写着的住址

translation.en: and followed him from there on foot to the library.
translation.zh: 尾随他从那里步行到图书馆

translation.en: [interviewer] Did it ever occur to you in all of this that someone might die?
translation.zh: 在这个过程中你有没有想过可能会死人？

translation.en: [Barriss] No, that never crossed my mind.
translation.zh: 没有 从没想过

translation.en: I've never killed anyone, so I don't know what that feels like.
translation.zh: 我没杀过人所以我不知道那是什么感觉

translation.en: But I've also never been responsible for someone dying.
translation.zh: 但我也没有害死过任何人

translation.en: But-but-but the consequences of killing someone, from what I know, are pretty severe.
translation.zh: 不过据我所知 杀人的后果非常严重

translation.en: You can get life in prison, you can get the death sentence.
translation.zh: 可能会判终身监禁 可能会判死刑

translation.en: So… being responsible for someone dying--
translation.zh: 所以…害死一个人…

translation.en: I was pretty much the sole reason that the police even went to that house.
translation.zh: 警察去那栋房子可以说是我一手造成的

translation.en: So when I found out someone died at the house that I sent the SWAT team to,
translation.zh: 所以当我得知有人死在我让特警队去的那栋房子里时

translation.en: I was… I couldn't… It was a very surreal moment for me.
translation.zh: 我…我无法…我感觉非常不真实

translation.en: [interviewer] Were you worried more about the ramifications on you,
translation.zh: 你是更关心自己面临的后果

translation.en: or the fact that someone's life was just taken?
translation.zh: 还是更关心有人失去了生命？

translation.en: [Barriss] Well, you… I was… It was-- it was both.
translation.zh: 你…我…两者都有

translation.en: I didn't immediately feel guilty that someone died.
translation.zh: 我的第一反应不是因为有人死了而感到内疚

translation.en: I didn't know what to think. It's almost like life wasn't real anymore.
translation.zh: 我的脑子一片空白仿佛生活不再真实

translation.en: [reporter 1] Police have arrested a 25-year-old man in Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 警方在洛杉矶逮捕了一名25岁男子

translation.en: [reporter 2] This is 25-year-old Tyler Barriss.
translation.zh: 这是25岁的泰勒·巴里斯

translation.en: We've learned that the LAPD has taken him into custody
translation.zh: 我们得知 洛杉矶警局已经将他羁押

translation.en: and he is facing potential charges in this case.
translation.zh: 他有可能在本案中面临指控

translation.en: In 2015, he was arrested because he called in bomb threats
translation.zh: 他曾于2015年因谎报炸弹威胁而被捕

translation.en: into a CNN-affiliate ABC, a television station in California.
translation.zh: 目标是位于加州的CNN子公司ABC电视台

translation.en: He eventually served two years in that case,
translation.zh: 最终他坐了两年牢

translation.en: so this certainly would not be the first time that he's done some serious damage with his phone.
translation.zh: 所以这绝对不是他第一次利用手机造成严重破坏了

translation.en: [Haze] I got over there for the first time that following night.
translation.zh: 第二天晚上 我第一次去到那里

translation.en: There was still blood on the front porch,
translation.zh: 正门的门廊上还留有血迹

translation.en: on the carpet of the entryway.
translation.zh: 就在门前的地毯上

translation.en: And that's when I did my first interview with Lisa.
translation.zh: 然后我对莉莎进行了第一次采访

translation.en: We're here with the mother
translation.zh: 我身边这位

translation.en: of last night's Wichita Police Department shooting victim.
translation.zh: 是昨晚威奇托警局枪击案受害人的母亲

translation.en: [Haze] It's like, "I don't…"
translation.zh: 我不…

translation.en: "I don't really know how to tell you this,
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么跟你说

translation.en: but it was a $1.50 bet on Call of Duty Online."
translation.zh: 但整件事的起因是押在

translation.en: "That's… the root of all this."
translation.zh: 《使命召唤》网络游戏上的1.5美元赌注

translation.en: I mean, a $1.50 bet.
translation.zh: 1.5美元赌注？

translation.en: I think it was
translation.zh: 我觉得…

translation.en: disgusting.
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: But it happened, and they're going to have to face it.
translation.zh: 但事情已经发生了 他们必须面对

translation.en: Everybody's gonna have to deal with it because it did happen.
translation.zh: 每个人都必须面对 因为的确发生了

translation.en: You know? Even myself.
translation.zh: 知道吧？包括我自己

translation.en: I have to deal with it.
translation.zh: 我必须面对

translation.en: [Haze] No matter how big of an asshole he is,
translation.zh: 不管他如何混蛋

translation.en: no matter how terrible a person he is,
translation.zh: 不管他有多么可恶

translation.en: at the end of the day, Tyler didn't pull the trigger.
translation.zh: 说到底 开枪的人不是他

translation.en: [Haze] Twelve other officers that night did not pull a trigger.
translation.zh: 那晚的12名其他警察没有开枪

translation.en: There was one officer that pulled a trigger.
translation.zh: 有一名警察开了枪

translation.en: The reaction was anger in this area.
translation.zh: 当地人的反应是愤怒

translation.en: [woman] It was a senseless murder
translation.zh: 这是毫无意义的谋杀… （安德鲁·芬奇烛光守夜）

translation.en: and we hope to find out more information as it comes out.
translation.zh: （安德鲁·芬奇烛光守夜） …我们希望能了解更多情况

translation.en: We need to stand out and make sure things like this don't happen,
translation.zh: 我们需要站出来确保这种事不再发生

translation.en: hold people accountable,
translation.zh: 追究责任

translation.en: and be here for those who have lost this great man,
translation.zh: 支持那些痛失至亲的人

translation.en: 28 years young.
translation.zh: 他只有28岁

translation.en: [vigil attendee] I think people are pretty horrified about what happened.
translation.zh: 我觉得这件事让大家感到恐怖

translation.en: They are fearful.
translation.zh: 他们很害怕

translation.en: They know it could've happened to anybody.
translation.zh: 他们知道这种事可能发生在任何人身上

translation.en: If we have a police force
translation.zh: 如果我们的警察

translation.en: which does the opposite of de-escalation in situations like this,
translation.zh: 如果我们的警察 不是缓和事态而是像这样做相反的事

translation.en: you have these tragedies.
translation.zh: 就会发生这种悲剧

translation.en: [Haze] In Wichita, in Kansas in general,
translation.zh: 在威奇托 在整个堪萨斯州

translation.en: they don't name the officers.
translation.zh: 警方不会说出涉事警察的姓名

translation.en: They protect the officers.
translation.zh: 他们会保护警察

translation.en: [reporter] Will we be able to get the name of the officer involved?
translation.zh: （威奇托市警局） 可以透露涉事警察的姓名吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's important to know that the department has a long history
translation.zh: 好的 请你明白不透露枪击案涉事警察的姓名

translation.en: of not releasing names of officers involved in shootings.
translation.zh: 这是警局的一贯立场

translation.en: [Dion Lefler] It's very difficult to get information on these incidents.
translation.zh: 对于这类事件 相关信息很难获得

translation.en: Kansas has possibly the weakest open records law in the country.
translation.zh: 堪萨斯的记录公开法律可能是全国最弱的

translation.en: They basically hope you don't find out and the statute of limitations expires
translation.zh: 他们希望你不会发现 拖到诉讼时效过去

translation.en: so they don't have to pay out on a case.
translation.zh: 他们就不用花钱打官司了

translation.en: The national average for shootings was about one for every 1300 officers.
translation.zh: 全国的平均开枪比例是每1300名警察发生一起

translation.en: In Wichita, 2012, we had one shooting death
translation.zh: 在威奇托 2012年的数据是

translation.en: for every 120 officers, approximately.
translation.zh: 大约每120名警察发生一起射杀

translation.en: So we were about 11 times higher than the national average here in Wichita.
translation.zh: 所以威奇托的数字是全国平均值的11倍

translation.en: [Haze] I received an email
translation.zh: 我收到一封电子邮件

translation.en: and the person said it had been a minute "since I've given you anything."
translation.zh: 对方说考虑到“我有段日子没有向你爆料了”

translation.en: "Your shooter's Justin Rapp."
translation.zh: “开枪的警察叫贾斯丁·拉普”

translation.en: [interviewer] You're first to publish his name.
translation.zh: 你是第一个公布他姓名的人

translation.en: [Haze] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [Ann Jones] Justin Rapp has been with our department now eight years.
translation.zh: 贾斯丁·拉普在警局干了八年了

translation.en: He has formal military training.
translation.zh: 他受过军事训练

translation.en: He has been featured in episodes of Cops a couple of times.
translation.zh: 他出演过几集《美国警察》

translation.en: [Rapp] Get on the ground, right now!
translation.zh: 趴在地上 快点！

translation.en: He has gotten many reports of "use of force" against him.
translation.zh: 有很多人举报他“使用武力”

translation.en: [Haze] We've been told there is around a dozen incident reports against Justin
translation.zh: 我们被告知就在安德鲁·芬奇被射杀之前

translation.en: before the shooting of Andrew Finch.
translation.zh: 针对贾斯丁的举报有十多起

translation.en: On one of our highway overpasses we put "Arrest Officer Rapp."
translation.zh: 我们在一座高速路天桥上贴出了“逮捕警察拉普”

translation.en: We just wanted to make sure Rapp's name stayed important.
translation.zh: 我们只想让拉普的名字保持热度

translation.en: That's also why we made the T-shirts.
translation.zh: 这也是我们制作T恤的原因

translation.en: One of my friends had seen that movie,
translation.zh: 我的一个朋友看过一部电影

translation.en: The Three Billboards or whatever.
translation.zh: 好像叫《三块广告牌》

translation.en: And he said, "Why don't we do that?"
translation.zh: 他说：“我们学电影里的做法吧”

translation.en: [reporter] Billboards are designed to catch your attention,
translation.zh: 广告是用来吸引你的眼球的

translation.en: but four digital billboards in Wichita
translation.zh: 然而威奇托的数字广告牌

translation.en: aren't marketed towards getting your money.
translation.zh: 不是为了让你掏钱买东西

translation.en: They're asking for justice.
translation.zh: 而是为了讨回公道

translation.en: [Jones] He didn't follow any procedure, any protocol.
translation.zh: 他没有遵守任何程序和制度

translation.en: He didn't even bother to think that this guy might be a hostage.
translation.zh: 他甚至没想想 这个人有可能是人质

translation.en: He just shot him dead and it could have happened to any of us.
translation.zh: 他就那样把他射杀了这种事可能发生在我们任何人身上

translation.en: So I think that's why the community has stayed so involved
translation.zh: 这就是为什么当地人如此积极地

translation.en: in pushing for the arrest of Justin Rapp.
translation.zh: 推动逮捕贾斯丁·拉普

translation.en: He needs to be charged for the murder of Andrew Finch.
translation.zh: 必须让他因为谋杀安德鲁·芬奇而受到指控

translation.en: …express thoughts and prayers…
translation.zh: …表达哀思和祈祷…

translation.en: [Lisa] The cops can't just go around shooting people without any consequences.
translation.zh: 不能让这些警察随心所欲地朝人们开枪 还不用承担任何后果

translation.en: I mean, that cop murdered my son.
translation.zh: 那名警察谋杀了我儿子

translation.en: [Lisa] My granddaughter saw the shooting
translation.zh: 我的外孙女目睹了开枪那一幕

translation.en: and had to see her uncle lay there dying.
translation.zh: 眼睁睁看着她的舅舅躺在那里死去

translation.en: She's only 17,
translation.zh: 她只有17岁

translation.en: but she's had a lot of trauma in her life.
translation.zh: 但已经承受了太多的创伤

translation.en: And I don't know if she'll survive this. I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道她能否挺过去 我不知道

translation.en: [Francis] I'm not going to lie,
translation.zh: 我不想说谎

translation.en: I did contemplate suicide, many times after that.
translation.zh: 事情发生后 我有很多次想过自杀

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: 你知道…

translation.en: But…
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: I just… It's just-- It's just…
translation.zh: 我…只是…

translation.en: Hold on, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 等一下 抱歉

translation.en: We're going to teach you how to make cake.
translation.zh: 我们会教你做蛋糕

translation.en: [Haze] Adelina clearly had some issues with what had happened.
translation.zh: 这件事显然对阿德琳娜造成了影响

translation.en: [Lisa] She was forced to see her father figure dying.
translation.zh: 她被迫目睹被她视为父亲的人死去

translation.en: She could not stand
translation.zh: 她无法忍受

translation.en: the constant nightmares and flashbacks.
translation.zh: 接连不断的恶梦和记忆闪回

translation.en: And she could not stand to be alone.
translation.zh: 也忍受不了孤独

translation.en: Exactly a year and two weeks, exactly,
translation.zh: 就在事情发生刚好过去一年零两个礼拜

translation.en: this past January 11th…
translation.zh: 今年的1月11日…

translation.en: Adelina shot herself in the head.
translation.zh: 阿德琳娜朝着自己的头部开了一枪

translation.en: [Lefler] And then her boyfriend, who found her having just shot herself,
translation.zh: 她的男朋友在得知她自杀后

translation.en: he wound up committing suicide too.
translation.zh: 也自杀了

translation.en: So really the death toll from this is three, not one.
translation.zh: 所以这件事造成了三人死亡 而不是一人

translation.en: [Francis] I'm surprised I'm still here today.
translation.zh: 没想到我今天还活着

translation.en: I'm surprised I'm sitting here doing this interview today, because…
translation.zh: 没想到今天我会坐在这里接受采访 因为…

translation.en: I thought it was going to be me that did it.
translation.zh: 我以为自杀的人会是我

translation.en: That night, she had taken me to work,
translation.zh: 那天晚上她送我去上班

translation.en: and she's supposed to pick me up at ten o'clock and we're supposed to hang out afterwards.
translation.zh: 本来说好她10点来接我下班然后一起出去玩

translation.en: Well, my cousin Jaden had came and he picked me up
translation.zh: 结果我表哥杰登来接我

translation.en: and I had told Adelina,
translation.zh: 我就跟阿德琳娜说

translation.en: [voice breaks] "You don't have to come pick me up. It's okay."
translation.zh: “你不用来接我了 没事”

translation.en: So, I was supposed to be with her,
translation.zh: 本来我应该跟她在一起的

translation.en: at the same exact time that she had killed herself.
translation.zh: 就在她自杀的那一刻

translation.en: And I wasn't.
translation.zh: 但我没有

translation.en: I just feel like I could have stopped it.
translation.zh: 我本来可以阻止她的

translation.en: I know her.
translation.zh: 我了解她

translation.en: That's why I should have seen that something was wrong.
translation.zh: 我应该看出来不对劲的

translation.en: There was-- There was, like…
translation.zh: 当时…

translation.en: [judge] Madam Clerk, can you call the next item, please?
translation.zh: 书记员 请宣布下一个事项

translation.en: [county clerk] Lisa Finch, Andrew Finch shooting.
translation.zh: 莉莎·芬奇 安德鲁·芬奇枪击案

translation.en: [Lisa] The death of my son has changed every iota of my being.
translation.zh: 我儿子的死彻底改变了我

translation.en: I never wanted to be in the public eye.
translation.zh: 我从来不想受到公众关注

translation.en: My preference before this was staying at home
translation.zh: 在此之前 我更喜欢待在家里

translation.en: and not to be put on display.
translation.zh: 而不是抛头露面

translation.en: The person I was before no longer exists.
translation.zh: 之前的那个我已经不存在了

translation.en: The concept of due process goes back as far… to 1215 A.D.
translation.zh: “正当程序”这个概念最早可以追溯到…公元1215年

translation.en: from Clause 39 of the Magna Carta.
translation.zh: 出自《大宪章》第39条

translation.en: This should indicate that due process is not new.
translation.zh: 这说明正当程序并非新生事物

translation.en: Shouldn't law enforcement and public officials be aware
translation.zh: 难道执法机构和公职人员不该知晓

translation.en: and abide by this constitutional right?
translation.zh: 并遵守宪法规定的这项权利吗？

translation.en: [judge] L-Lisa. Can you wrap it up right quick?
translation.zh: 莉莎 可以快点结束吗？

translation.en: You've gone over five minutes. So…
translation.zh: 你已经超过五分钟了 所以…

translation.en: My time has been taken away from me, sir.
translation.zh: 我的发言时间被剥夺了 先生

translation.en: -This is my time. Are you…? Do you-- -Right.
translation.zh: -现在是我的时间 你…？-好吧

translation.en: [woman] She can have my five minutes.
translation.zh: 我把我那五分钟给她

translation.en: -[judge] She can't. That's not the rules. -You work for the public.
translation.zh: -不行 这不合规矩-你是为公众服务的

translation.en: -[judge] Correct. -I'm taking my time.
translation.zh: -没错-我想说多久就说多久

translation.en: I'm gonna make them so uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 我要让他们如坐针毡

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: And I'm going to continue talking about this…
translation.zh: 我将继续谈论这个…

translation.en: [Jones] She's strong. And she's a fighter. -And, uh… -[applause]
translation.zh: 她很坚强 她是个斗士 而且…

translation.en: …she's not going to let them get away with this.
translation.zh: 她不会放过他们

translation.en: She's just not.
translation.zh: 就是不会

translation.en: [Marc Bennett] To charge Officer Number 1 would require evidence, not 20/20 hindsight.
translation.zh: 指控一号警官需要证据而不能凭后见之明

translation.en: That it was unreasonable for him
translation.zh: 在当时那种情况下

translation.en: to believe in that moment that the man who came to the door
translation.zh: 无法要求他认定走到门口的那个男人

translation.en: posed a risk to the officers near the house,
translation.zh: 会对房屋附近的警官构成危险

translation.en: there is insufficient evidence to overcome self-defense immunity under Kansas law.
translation.zh: 目前没有足够的证据 认定堪萨斯州法律规定的正当防卫豁免权不适用

translation.en: So under Kansas law and the facts of this case,
translation.zh: 所以根据堪萨斯州法律及本案事实

translation.en: I conclude that no charges will be filed against the officer
translation.zh: 我决定不就安德鲁·芬奇之死

translation.en: for the death of Andrew Finch.
translation.zh: 对这名警官提出指控

translation.en: [reporter] Deputy Chief Troy Livingston says it was in this moment
translation.zh: 警局副局长特洛伊·利文斯顿称就是在这一刻

translation.en: when Finch dropped his hand,
translation.zh: 当芬奇放下双手时

translation.en: an officer thought he reached for a weapon.
translation.zh: 一名警官以为他要伸手掏枪

translation.en: You see the officer pull the trigger on the lower left side of the screen.
translation.zh: 在屏幕左下角可以看到这名警官扣动了扳机

translation.en: You have officers from the other side also giving commands
translation.zh: 另一侧也有警官在命令他

translation.en: and they were all consistent about "Put your hands up, walk towards us,"
translation.zh: 他们的命令都是“举起手来 朝我们走过来”

translation.en: um, but he continued to drop them down by his waistband.
translation.zh: 但他继续放下双手 垂到了腰部

translation.en: [Lefler] I don't think that complete exoneration was what most people were expecting,
translation.zh: 我认为大多数人没料到他能完全脱罪

translation.en: or that there wouldn't be any charges filed.
translation.zh: 或者未受到任何指控

translation.en: That kind of reverberated through the community.
translation.zh: 这让当地人炸开了锅

translation.en: [Lorrie Hernandez] When I got back here, my sister said, "You need to sit down."
translation.zh: 我回来的时候 我妹妹让我坐下

translation.en: "I got to tell you some bad news and you're not going to want to hear it."
translation.zh: 她说：“我要告诉你一个坏消息你肯定不想听”

translation.en: [reporter] Andrew Finch's family is upset to learn
translation.zh: 得知那名警察不会面临指控

translation.en: that police will not face charges for the shooting.
translation.zh: 安德鲁·芬奇的家人很气愤

translation.en: This decision almost four months after his death.
translation.zh: 这个决定距离他死亡已经过了快四个月了

translation.en: [SWAT officer] Walk this way!
translation.zh: 朝这边走！

translation.en: Walk--
translation.zh: 朝…

translation.en: [Haze] Not even worth going to trial.
translation.zh: 甚至不值得开庭审理

translation.en: Although Casey, Shane, and Tyler, all three are.
translation.zh: 不过凯西、肖恩和泰勒全都受到了审判

translation.en: Casey asked somebody to do a swatting.
translation.zh: 凯西指使他人从事特警恶搞

translation.en: Shane Gaskill gave an address, and talked shit to somebody.
translation.zh: 肖恩·加斯基尔提供地址并且煽动他人

translation.en: And these guys got charged.
translation.zh: 他们受到了指控

translation.en: Justin Rapp pulled the trigger that killed Andrew Finch,
translation.zh: 贾斯丁·拉普开枪打死了安德鲁·芬奇

translation.en: and he didn't even get a slap on the wrist. He still has his job.
translation.zh: 他没有受到任何惩戒 仍在当警察

translation.en: [Haze] We did learn in September of 2021
translation.zh: 2021年9月的时候 我们还不知道

translation.en: that Justin was actually involved in two other shootings
translation.zh: 在安德鲁·芬奇被枪杀之前

translation.en: before the Andrew Finch shooting.
translation.zh: 贾斯丁还与另外两起枪击事件有关

translation.en: Hello, sir, are you Tyler Barriss?
translation.zh: 你好 先生 你是泰勒·巴里斯吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Mr. Barriss, I show you're currently charged with involuntary manslaughter,
translation.zh: 巴里斯先生 你目前受到多项指控包括过失杀人罪

translation.en: giving false alarm, and interference with law enforcement officers.
translation.zh: 报假警和干扰执法人员

translation.en: Your next court date is January 25th at 9:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 你的下一次出庭日期是1月25日上午9点

translation.en: Do you have any questions, sir?
translation.zh: 你有什么问题吗 先生？

translation.en: -No, I don't. -All right, thank you.
translation.zh: -没有-好的 谢谢

translation.en: Tyler is facing his involuntary manslaughter charge at the state level in Kansas.
translation.zh: 在堪萨斯州层面泰勒将面临过失杀人罪指控

translation.en: In other federal jurisdictions,
translation.zh: 在其他联邦管辖区

translation.en: he's, uh, charged with crimes associated to his swatting,
translation.zh: 他被指控犯有与特警恶搞

translation.en: his bomb threats, of which there are many, many counts,
translation.zh: 以及炸弹威胁相关的罪行 有很多起

translation.en: and he's able to negotiate a global plea
translation.zh: 他可以针对这些联邦指控

translation.en: to the federal charges that roll all of the cases into one,
translation.zh: 申请控辩交易将这些案子合并为一个

translation.en: and then Tyler pleads guilty.
translation.zh: 然后泰勒认罪

translation.en: [reporter] Tyler Barriss sentenced today to 20 years behind bars
translation.zh: 泰勒·巴里斯今天被判处20年监禁

translation.en: after pleading guilty for a swatting prank that turned deadly.
translation.zh: 之前他针对致人死亡的特警恶搞事件承认有罪

translation.en: The longest prison sentence in the country ever imposed for the practice of swatting.
translation.zh: 这是国内针对特警恶搞判处过的最长刑期 （斯蒂芬·麦卡利斯特堪萨斯州地方检察官）

translation.en: We hope that this will send a strong message.
translation.zh: 我们希望这能起到强烈的警示作用

translation.en: [interviewer] Tyler Barriss got 20 years in prison.
translation.zh: 泰勒·巴里斯被判了20年

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -What do you think about that? -I think it's good.
translation.zh: -你怎么看？-我觉得很好

translation.en: You know, like my son said, we have to forgive people.
translation.zh: 就像我儿子说的 我们必须宽恕别人

translation.en: Because that's what…
translation.zh: 因为根据…

translation.en: we're supposed to do, according to our faith.
translation.zh: 我们的信仰 我们就该这样做

translation.en: And I'm trying to forgive.
translation.zh: 我在试着宽恕

translation.en: [Francis] These are just a few of his drawings.
translation.zh: 这些是他画的 只是其中几张

translation.en: On my birthday, he would always draw stuff out for me.
translation.zh: 每次我过生日 他都会为我画一张

translation.en: This one right here is one of my favorites.
translation.zh: 这张是我最喜欢的

translation.en: The Internet, well, all it did is
translation.zh: 互联网的作用就是

translation.en: bring two idiots together playing a video game.
translation.zh: 让两个笨蛋聚在一起玩游戏

translation.en: Technology benefits people with brains, intelligent people.
translation.zh: 对于有脑子的聪明人来说科技是有益的

translation.en: But when technology is used by idiots, it creates chaos and it creates disasters
translation.zh: 但是当笨蛋使用科技时就会造成混乱和灾难

translation.en: and that's exactly what happened.
translation.zh: 这件事就是这样

translation.en: [Francis] The gaming community, I believe, can be very toxic,
translation.zh: 有时游戏圈非常具有毒害性

translation.en: can be very, very negative.
translation.zh: 不良影响非常大

translation.en: Sometimes I'll get messages, like, um,
translation.zh: 有时我会收到这样的信息

translation.en: "If you keep on doing that I'm gonna trace your IP address"
translation.zh: “如果你继续这样我将追踪你的IP地址”

translation.en: and fry my router or something like that. Like, take down my Internet.
translation.zh: 弄瘫我的路由器之类的 让我无法上网

translation.en: They'll say like, "Go fuck yourself," you know, "Go kill yourself."
translation.zh: 他们会说：“去死吧”、“去自杀吧”

translation.en: "I'm gonna go swat your house."
translation.zh: “我要让特警去你家”

translation.en: But, uh, I like it because it takes me out of the world.
translation.zh: 但我喜欢玩游戏因为这能让我远离外面的世界

translation.en: It takes me into my own mindset.
translation.zh: 让我沉浸在自己的内心世界

translation.en: I have full control of everything that I do.
translation.zh: 我能够全面掌控我做的一切

translation.en: I can do whatever I want within the parameters of that game.
translation.zh: 在游戏中 我可以随心所欲地做任何事

translation.en: Just go on there and beat the living shit out of somebody,
translation.zh: 可以把别人揍得半死

translation.en: over and over and over again.
translation.zh: 一遍又一遍

translation.en: And then I'm not angry anymore.
translation.zh: 然后我就不再愤怒了

translation.en: [Francis] I feel as if it's a therapy for me.
translation.zh: 我感觉这对我是一种治疗

translation.en: It's not just something that I do just for fun.
translation.zh: 我玩游戏不只是为了好玩

translation.en: It keeps me from thinking about the situation, pretty much.
translation.zh: 它能让我不去想烦心事

translation.en: I cannot make any action to make all this go away.
translation.zh: 我没有办法让这一切消失

translation.en: You know, I can't just sit here and go like this, and now my life's going back to normal.
translation.zh: 我不可能坐在这里打个响指就让我的生活恢复正常

translation.en: But if I wanted to, I could do that in a video game
translation.zh: 但在游戏中我能做到

translation.en: and I find that pretty cool. You know?
translation.zh: 我觉得这挺酷的

translation.en: That's what I like about that.
translation.zh: 这就是我喜欢玩游戏的原因

translation.en: [woman] The Internet just went crazy.
translation.zh: （接下来）

translation.en: You have to question your own sense of reality.
translation.zh: 赞许那种观念 这种想法太骇人了

translation.en: [man 2] I was called the hit man.
translation.zh: 我是受害者还是恶棍？
